title: Vulnerable APIs and Bot Attacks Costing Businesses Up to $186 Billion Annually
description: Organizations are losing between $94 - $186 billion annually to vulnerable or insecure APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) and automated abuse by bots. Thatâ€™s according to The Economic Impact of API and Bot Attacks report from Imperva, a Thales company.
